LanguageData.DMS_Apparel_ArmyCap.label: Army Cap
LanguageData.DMS_Apparel_ArmyCap.description: A standard issue army patrol cap, great for keeping the sun off your face or the rain out of your eyes.
LanguageData.DMS_Apparel_ArrayHelmet.label: Operator Helmet
LanguageData.DMS_Apparel_ArrayHelmet.description: A full face helmet designed for field drone operators featuring a built-in head-mounted display and neural-connected operating system. Provides a massive increase to the control bandwidth for mechanoids and gives full ballistic protection to the head and face.
LanguageData.DMS_Apparel_Beret.label: Beret
LanguageData.DMS_Apparel_Beret.description: A more stylish cap typically used to identify the wearer as belonging in a specialty unit
LanguageData.DMS_Apparel_BionicSuit.label: Bionic Suit
LanguageData.DMS_Apparel_BionicSuit.description: A step above the civilian model Powered Exoskeleton Suit, this military grade bionic suit is sewn from artificial muscle fibers and amplifies the wearers pre-existing muscular strength. Greatly increases the wearers carrying capacity and movement speed.
LanguageData.DMS_Apparel_SoftKepi.label: Soft Kepi
LanguageData.DMS_Apparel_SoftKepi.description: A traditional hat with a flat circular top and a visor.
LanguageData.DMS_Apparel_TacticalCloak.label: Tactical Cloak
LanguageData.DMS_Apparel_TacticalCloak.description: A cloak capable of low-level active camouflage typically equipped by sappers and special operators in the Colonial Forces.
LanguageData.DMS_Apparel_TacticalHelmet.label: Tactical Helmet
LanguageData.DMS_Apparel_TacticalHelmet.description: A lightweight combat helmet reinforced with plasteel to prevent backface deformation after its impacted by a round. Great at protecting the wearer from bullets and shrapnel, not so great at protecting the wearer from blunt force trauma.
LanguageData.DMS_Apparel_TacticalVest.label: Tactical Vest
LanguageData.DMS_Apparel_TacticalVest.description: A vest with armor plates inserted on the chest and back. While quite effective at deflecting gunshots and stabbing attacks against the chest, it does nothing to protect the limbs.
